seo.title: About Us | Digital Consulting & Web Development for SMEs | Metis Web Agency
seo.description: Metis Web Agency by Elisabetta Monaco: digital consulting and web development for SMEs and professionals. Method, clarity and consistency to turn digital into a real business tool.

content.eyebrow: The web agency for small and medium businesses
content.title:
Metis Web Agency
Digital built to serve your business.
content.subtitle:
We don’t sell “a website”.
We build a journey that helps people find you, trust you and contact you.
content.body: We work with SMEs and professionals who want to invest wisely. We start from goals and audience, define a clear message, then turn it into coherent pages and content.

content.title: We turn digital into a business tool
content.subtitle: Clear goals, a coherent presence, measurable results.

columns.title:
The point isn’t just “being online” if nobody can find you.

That’s why we work on strategy, website and visibility as one connected journey.

columns.description: We help SMEs and professionals stop improvising. We start from audience and positioning, build a lean and convincing website, then activate SEO/Ads and clean tracking (GA4/GTM) to understand what actually works.

content.title:
Advertising isn’t “for big brands”.

It’s a basic need if you want to grow.
content.subtitle: If you run a business, being known isn’t optional.
content.body:
We believe in digital that is accessible and practical. You don’t need to do what everyone else does—you need to do the right things, in the right order.

That’s why we combine strategy, development and visibility into a clear, measurable journey that’s sustainable over time.

media.alt: Digital communication for SMEs | Metis Web Agency

content.title:
Advertising isn’t just a cost,
it can become a more sustainable investment
content.subtitle: When it’s built with method, it can be optimized—even financially.
content.body:
In many cases, marketing and advertising expenses can be treated as business costs when they are relevant and properly documented. That doesn’t mean “magic”—it means setting strategy, tracking and reporting the right way so every euro has a reason and a result.

When available, there may also be incentives and grants linked to digital transformation. We can check if there’s anything useful for your case and help you prepare what’s needed—working alongside your accountant.

columns.title:
It’s easy to know if we’re a fit
Better to be clear from the start—so we work well together.

If you only want a “brochure website” to publish and forget, we’re not the right partner.

If you want a journey with clear goals, consistency and measurable results, then we’re aligned.

header.title: A 3-step process, no improvisation
header.subtitle: Clear goals, concrete deliverables, continuous improvement.
header.body: We work in phases. Each step produces clear outputs—so you always know what we’re doing and why.

items.title: Strategy & direction
items.description: We align goals and priorities, define audience and message. We structure what matters and decide what’s really needed to get results.

items.title: Build & convert
items.description: We build a website or landing with copy, CTAs and tracking (GA4/GTM). The foundation must be fast, clear and designed to turn visits into enquiries.

items.title: Visibility & optimization
items.description: We activate SEO and/or Ads, measure what works and optimize. The goal: grow results and reduce waste over time.

content.title: Message us on WhatsApp
content.subtitle: We’ll tell you if it makes sense, timing and next steps.
content.description:
For a fast reply, send 3 things

01 - your industry
02 - goal (leads / sales / visibility)
03 - website link (if any).
